title: Level Not Updating
body: I'm a level 5 account, but I can't post anywhere but here... I can't even comment on this post.

replies.body: There shouldn't be level restrictions that would prevent you from posting on H&S.  If you are still having issues posting, try resetting your [cache and cookies](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies), as well as relogging.  You could also try another browser or incognito mode.  Hope that helps!

It was weird, the only way I could post was from the 'Create a Discussion' link on the front page. Here it said 'You must be level 1 to Post.' Thanks for the quick reply! It took about 30 minutes to update.
